about_the_game:
You wake up, not remembering what dream you had last night. What time is it? Does that matter? This is a simple exploration game. Or at least, that's what I'd like you to believe. Different people experience different things in their lives, and that's reflected in this game. Things come and go, fleeting moments that are easy to miss. What causes things to come into existence? Were they always there, or do they only exist once they're perceived? There's more to life than death. If you don't find anything, close me. You digging through my secrets is unpleasant to me. You might get curious and decide to open me again, but maybe it'd be best if you didn't.

To-Do List:

  • Open me
  • Wake up
  • Go outside
  • Smell the flowers
  • Stare at the horizon
  • Come back inside
  • Go get a cup of water
  • Contemplate life
  • Go back to bed
  • Close me

  • ...

  • Open me again?
  • ???

content_descriptors.notes: Close Me has some depictions of violence, light gore, theme of depression, veiled nudity and sexual situations. Much of this is non-detailed, and the game has no dialogue.

detailed_description:
You wake up, not remembering what dream you had last night. What time is it? Does that matter? This is a simple exploration game. Or at least, that's what I'd like you to believe. Different people experience different things in their lives, and that's reflected in this game. Things come and go, fleeting moments that are easy to miss. What causes things to come into existence? Were they always there, or do they only exist once they're perceived? There's more to life than death. If you don't find anything, close me. You digging through my secrets is unpleasant to me. You might get curious and decide to open me again, but maybe it'd be best if you didn't.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

name: Close Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

short_description: You start the game, you wake up, and eventually you will close the game. One day, you may even start the game again. That's the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
